data.eml:eml: The genus Zelentia is an amphi-boreal taxon expanded to include three new species from the North Pacific and Atlantic oceans (Gastropoda: Nudibranchia: Trinchesiidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Korshunovа, Tаtiаnа, Fletcher, Kаrin, Lundin, Kennet, Picton, Bernаrd, Mаrtynov, Аlexаnder (2018): The genus Zelentia is an amphi-boreal taxon expanded to include three new species from the North Pacific and Atlantic oceans (Gastropoda: Nudibranchia: Trinchesiidae). Zootaxa 4482 (2): 297-321, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4482.2.4
